author: pohanoikumpiri
text:
[Croatia at the olympics](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Croatia_at_the_Olympics). Along with the Olympics, we were twice the world champs in tennis, twice in water polo, once in handball,  and a bunch of individual athletes were champions in their own sports.
